sections.summary:
Energetic Childcare Provider with 7+ years working with children in settings such as a day care center, in home nanny, and elementary schools.
Works well as part of a team while following all teacher-driven directives. Proactive and self-sufficient in creating innovative ways to deliver
curriculum.
sections.skills: Being able to work as a a team to help de-escalate situations.
sections.certifications: First Aid, CPR, and CPI Certified.
